North_Little_Rock.LISA Academy North:
LISA Academy North is an open-enrollment public charter high school located near North Little Rock in Sherwood, Arkansas, United States. LISA Academy North or Little Scholars of Arkansas Academy – North Little Rock serves more than 250 students in grades 6 through 12 and is administered by the LISA Academy Charter School.
LISA Academy North is a non-sectarian, non-discriminatory, tuition-free school financed by Arkansas State Board of Education.
